!Warehouse Chief Natools: In the name of Shadow Fox... You must choose now. Select either the request of the Temple and the Lords of Dawn, or that of the Preachers of the Wilderness and the Revolutionaries of Dusk... Choose wisely -- once you have made your decision, it cannot be reversed... [Quest _142_FallenAngelRequestOfDawn reply_1|"I want to hear about the Lords of Dawn and the Temple again."] [Quest _142_FallenAngelRequestOfDawn reply_2|"I want to hear about the Revolutionaries of Dusk again."] [Quest _142_FallenAngelRequestOfDawn quest_accept|"I will accept the request of the Temple and the Lords of Dawn."] [Quest _143_FallenAngelRequestOfDusk quest_accept|"I will accept the request of the Revolutionaries of Dusk."]
